images.prompt: In a breathtaking over-the-shoulder view, a majestic skyforged lioness emerges from a swirling tempest of plasma arcs, her form a stunning fusion of flame and steel, as her dissolving skin reveals intricate patterns of molten metal and ethereal light, embodying the essence of new wave artistry, where vibrant hues dance across her powerful silhouette, casting an otherworldly glow that illuminates the surrounding landscape, creating a surreal atmosphere that captivates the imagination and invites the viewer to explore the depths of this fantastical realm.
